casebody.data:
IN RE: CONDEMNATION BY SUNUCO PIPELINE L.P. of Permanent and Temporary Rights of Way for the Transportation of Ethane, Propane, Liquid Petroleum Gas, and Other Petroleum Products in Edgemont Township, Delaware County, Pennsylvania, Over the Lands of Charles S. Katz, Jr. and Karen M. Katz Petition of: Charles S. Katz, Jr. and Karen M. Katz No. 507 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. January 22, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 22nd day of January, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
